outputs.output_descr: Public and Policy  Advocacy/ increase awareness on human rights issues.  A group of women from the government, CSOs, private sector and vulnerable groups would be interviewed to reflect their views and perspectives on the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, focusing on Thailand's implementation.

project_descr: Preparation of the publication to commemorate the 60th Anniversary of the Universal Declartion of Human Rights.
project_title: 60th Anniversary of Universal Declaration of HumanRights
